response.explain: The previous action code was successful in placing the bacon on the griddle. Now, we need to turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
response.subtask:
(1) Take out the bacon from the fridge.
(2) Put the bacon on the griddle.
(3) Turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Turn on the stove to cook the bacon.
    stove = registry(env, "stove_rgpphy_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
